Non è necessario che tu sia in grado di vedere la tua destinazione, a patto che tu sia già stato in quel luogo in passato e che tu ne conosca relativamente la locazione e la distanza dalla tua posizione. Sei temporaneamente immune per 1 ora.
Dimension Door (At will).name: Dimension Door (At will)

Exorcism Vulnerability.name: Exorcism Vulnerability
Exorcism Vulnerability.description: If an invidiak attempts to possess a creature and the creature rolls a critical success on its saving throw to resist @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{Possession}, or if an invidiak's possession of a creature is ended prematurely, such as via a successful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}, the invidiak takes [[/r 6d6[mental]]] damage and cannot use possession for 24 hours.

Shadow Blend.name: Shadow Blend
Shadow Blend.description: The invidiak Strides up to twice their speed. If the invidiak ends their movement in an area of dim light, they become hidden as long as they don't move and the lighting in the area they're in doesn't grow brighter than dim light.

Favored Host.name: Favored Host
Favored Host.description:
Each invidiak has a particular type of creature they prefer possessing, chosen from the following list:

  • aberration
  • animal
  • beast
  • any humanoid (such as dwarf)

In most cases, the favored type of target is human. When an invidiak uses possession against a favored host, the duration of possession increases to unlimited, and the effect lasts until dispelled or until the invidiak dismisses it.

Invidiak.name: Invidiak
Invidiak.description: For most demons, possessing a creature requires a ritual, magic item, or condition, but for invidiaks, who lack a body, possession is akin to donning a suit of clothing. Known also as shadow demons, invidiaks are formed from envious mortal souls.

Pus Burst.name: Pus Burst
Pus Burst.description:
Trigger The giant crawling hand takes piercing or slashing damage

Effect A random creature adjacent to the giant crawling hand is sprayed with vile pus that deals [[/r 4d6[negative]]] damage. The affected creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:21|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Critical Success The creature takes no damage.

Success The creature takes half damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Failure The creature takes full damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 3}.

Mark Quarry.name: Mark Quarry
Mark Quarry.description: A crawling hand can be assigned a quarry by anointing the hand with a drop of the intended quarry's blood. If the hand ever has no quarry, it automatically gains the next creature it damages as its quarry. The hand gains a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks when it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seeks} its quarry, to Survival checks when it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Tracks} its quarry, and damage rolls when it Strikes its quarry.

Giant Crawling Hand.name: Giant Crawling Hand
Giant Crawling Hand.description:
A giant crawling hand is the appendage of a very large creature, such as a giant.

Typically, crawling hands are formed when severed appendages are endowed with a crude sentience by evil necromantic energies that turn them into tireless killers. Yet crawling hands can also arise spontaneously, usually when a creature loses an appendage in a place rife with necromantic energy or with a connection to the Negative Energy Plane.

Sneak Attack.name: Attacco Furtivo
Sneak Attack.description:
The spriggan warlord's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

+1 Crossbow.description: Quest’arma a distanza ha una struttura simile a un arco montata su un’impugnatura chiamata teniere. Il teniere ha un meccanismo per bloccare la corda dell’arco in posizione, collegato a un sistema a grilletto che rilascia la tensione e consente di scagliare il proiettile.
+1 Crossbow.name: +1 Crossbow

+1 Morningstar.description: Quest'arma ha una corta impugnatura sormontata da una palla di metallo costellata di spuntoni.
+1 Morningstar.name: +1 Morningstar

Enraged Growth.name: Enraged Growth
Enraged Growth.description:
Trigger The spriggan warlord takes damage

Effect The spriggan warlord grows to size Large, along with their equipment (which returns to natural size if removed). The spriggan warlord's reach increases by 5 feet. They regain 15 Hit Points and gain a +2 status bonus to melee attack and damage rolls.

This effect continues until the end of the spriggan warlord's next turn, but on any turn in which the spriggan warlord deals damage to another creature and is not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}, the effect extends until the end of the following turn.

When Enraged Growth ends, the spriggan warlord is fatigued for 1 hour.

Bully's Bludgeon.name: Bully's Bludgeon
Bully's Bludgeon.description: The spriggan warlord makes a morningstar Strike with a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack roll. This attack is nonlethal.

Warlord's Training.name: Warlord's Training
Warlord's Training.description: A spriggan warlord has access to the critical specialization effects for crossbows and morningstars, and the reload of any crossbow they wield is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

Spriggan Warlord.name: Spriggan Warlord
Spriggan Warlord.description: While the leaders of larger spriggan enclaves tend to be uniquely trained warriors with highly specialized skills, spriggan warlords are fond of the traditional spriggan weaponry of morningstar and crossbow, valuing this traditional fighting style for its simplicity and for using both weapons to their full potential. Spriggan warlords often serve as sub-commanders in large groups, filling roles in spriggan society akin to captains of the guard or bodyguards to spriggan royalty. In smaller groups or remote outposts, a single spriggan warlord is typically in charge of a band of spriggan bullies.

Change Shape.name: Cambiare Forma
Change Shape.description:
The gosreg takes on the appearance of any Small or Medium humanoid. This doesn't change its Speed or its attack and damage modifiers with its Strikes, but it might change the damage type its Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning).

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Thoughtsense.name: Thoughtsense
Thoughtsense.description: The gosreg senses a creature's mental essence as a precise sense with the listed range; it cannot sense mindless creatures with thoughtsense.

Unsettled Aura.name: Unsettled Aura
Unsettled Aura.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Gosregs project a field of discordant energy that unsettles the minds of thinking creatures. Any non-mindless creature within 30 feet of a gosreg takes a -1 status penalty to Will saves.

Mind Bolt.name: Mind Bolt
Mind Bolt.description: A gosreg concentrates its field of discordant mental energy and projects it into the mind of an enemy within 60 feet. The target takes [[/r 6d6[mental]]] damage (@Check[type:will|dc:30|basic:true] save). On a critical failure, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Gosreg.name: Gosreg
Gosreg.description:
Gosregs are agents of the Dominion of the Black that insinuate themselves into humanoid societies to foster the goals of their sinister alien masters. They act as spies and special forces that can mingle with humanoid society while enacting plans for the rest of the Dominion in secret.

In their natural forms, gosregs dart about in a jerky gallop due to their stumpy legs and gangly arms. They take on the appearances of humanoids to infiltrate societies, and they drop their disguises only when they feel they are ultimately compromised and must resort to physical violence to protect their agendas. Their brain-like heads and bestial legs suggest a potential link with a similar Dominion of the Black agent: the dreaded intellect devourer.

Breath Weapon.name: Soffio
Breath Weapon.description:
The icewyrm breathes a @Template[type:line|distance:60] of freezing shards of razor-sharp ice, dealing [[/r 3d12[cold]]] damage and [[/r 3d12[piercing]]] damage to every creature in the line (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true] save).

The icewyrm can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Explosion.description: When the icewyrm dies, it explodes, dealing [[/r 8d6[cold]]] damage to each creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true] save).
Explosion.name: Explosion

Ice Burrow.name: Ice Burrow
Ice Burrow.description: The Icewyrm can Burrow through ice or snow with a Speed of 20 feet. It moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.

Icewyrm.name: Icewyrm
Icewyrm.description: Resembling wingless, serpentine dragons formed of jagged ice and shot through with veins of nearly frozen water, these elementals dwell within icebergs and enjoy striking out at passing ships or creatures. They're especially common in frigid stretches of ocean in the Plane of Water, where icebergs cluster together into enormous islands of ice.

Attack of Opportunity.name: Attacco di Opportunità
Attack of Opportunity.description:
A grindylow gains 1 extra reaction at the start of each of its turns that it can use only to make an Attack of Opportunity with a tentacle. It can't use more than one Attack of Opportunity triggered by the same choice.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

Clinging Suckers.name: Clinging Suckers
Clinging Suckers.description: When a grindylow @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{Grabs} a creature larger than itself, it attaches to that creature. The @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} creature is not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, but if it moves, the grindylow moves with it. If the creature is Medium or smaller, it takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds while the grindylow is attached. The grindylow is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} while it is attached to a creature.

True Seeing (Constant).name: Visione del Vero (Costante)
True Seeing (Constant).description: Puoi vedere le cose entro 18 metri per quello che sono veramente. Il GM tira in segreto una prova di contrasto contro tutte le illusioni o trasmutazioni all'interno dell'area, ma soltanto allo scopo di determinare se vedi attraverso di esse (per esempio, se la prova ha successo contro un incantesimo metamorfosi, puoi vedere la vera forma della creatura, ma non poni fine all'incantesimo metamorfosi).

Freedom of Movement (Constant).name: Libertà di Movimento (Costante)
Freedom of Movement (Constant).description: Respingi gli effetti che ostacolerebbero una creatura o ne rallenterebbero i movimenti. Il bersaglio, mentre è sotto l'effetto di questo incantesimo, ignora tutti gli effetti che potrebbero fornire penalità di circostanza alla Velocità. Quando il bersaglio tenta di @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Sfuggire} da un effetto che lo ha @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Afferrato} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Trattenuto}, il tentativo ha successo automaticamente, a meno che l'effetto sia un effetto magico e di un livello superiore a quello dell'incantesimo libertà di movimento.

Motion Sense.name: Motion Sense
Motion Sense.description: A carnivorous blob can sense nearby creatures through vibration and air or water movement.

Reactive Strikes.name: Reactive Strikes
Reactive Strikes.description:
Trigger The carnivorous blob takes damage from any source

Effect The blob makes a pseudopod Strike against an adjacent target. If an adjacent creature dealt the triggering damage, that creature is the target of this Reactive Strike.

Split.name: Split
Split.description: When a carniverous blob that has 10 or more HP is hit by an attack that would deal piercing or slashing damage, it splits into two identical oozes, each with half the original's HP. One ooze is in the same space as the original, and the other is in an adjacent, unoccupied space. If no adjacent space is unoccupied, it automatically pushes creatures and objects out of the way to fill a space (the GM decides if an object or creature is too big or heavy to push).

Carnivorous Blob Acid.name: Carnivorous Blob Acid
Carnivorous Blob Acid.description: A carnivorous blob's acid damages only flesh-not bone, stone, wood, or other materials- but is nonetheless devastating. Whenever a creature takes damage from this acid, it must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (drained 2 on a critical failure). On each subsequent failure, the drained condition value increases by 1 (or by 2 on a critical failure), to a maximum of drained 4.

Carnivorous Blob.name: Carnivorous Blob
Carnivorous Blob.description: Carnivorous blobs are the ravenous spawn of shattered worlds far beyond the stars, born across the galaxy in inert form until they fall like meteorites onto unsuspecting worlds. These massive beings can lie dormant for years in desolate caverns or barren wastelands. When a carnivorous blob perceives living creatures nearby, it lurches to gelatinous life, seeking out and consuming every creature it can catch until it is destroyed or until it has been unable to locate food for 24 hours, at which point it returns to hibernation. Often, keeping food away from a carnivorous blob is the safest way to defeat it. The blob's ability to split into smaller oozes that might stay hidden after a fight means it can be hard to fully eradicate these mindless predators.

Gust of Wind (At Will).name: Folata di Vento (A Volontà)
Gust of Wind (At Will).description:
Un vento violento si sprigiona dal palmo della tua mano, soffiando dal punto dove ti trovi al momento in cui lanci l'incantesimo fino alla fine della linea. Il vento spegne fuochi non magici piccoli, disperde nebbia e bruma, fa volteggiare oggetti di Volume leggero o inferiore e spinge oggetti più grandi. Le creature di taglia Grande o inferiore all'interno dell'area devono effettuare un tiro salvezza su Tempra. Le creature di taglia Grande o inferiore che entrano in seguito nella folata devono effettuare il tiro salvezza nel momento in cui entrano.

Successo Critico La creatura non è influenzata.

Successo La creatura non si può muovere contro vento.

Fallimento La creatura cade a terra @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{prona}. Se stava volando, subisce invece gli effetti di fallimento critico.

Fallimento Critico La creatura viene spinta di 9 metri nella direzione del vento, cade a terra @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{prona} e subisce 2d6 danni contundenti.

Breath Weapon.name: Soffio
Breath Weapon.description: The dragon breathes a thundercloud that deals [[/r 15d6[electricity]]] damage in a @Template[type:cone|distance:50] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:35|basic:true] save). They can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Draconic Frenzy.name: Frenesia Draconica
Draconic Frenzy.description: Il drago effettua due Colpi con l'artiglio e un Colpo con il corno in qualsiasi ordine.

Draconic Momentum.name: Impeto Draconico
Draconic Momentum.description: The dragon recharges their Breath Weapon whenever they score a critical hit with a Strike.

Mist Vision.description: Fog and mist don't impair a cloud dragon's vision; they ignore the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition from fog and mist.
Mist Vision.name: Mist Vision

Deflecting Cloud.name: Deflecting Cloud
Deflecting Cloud.description:
Trigger The dragon is the target of a ranged attack

Requirements The dragon is aware of the attack and has a free wing

Effect The cloud dragon flexes a wing and creates a billowing cloud of mist. The dragon is treated as if they were @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} for the purposes of resolving the triggering attack, so normally the attacker must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:11] to target them. The dragon also gains a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Cloud Form.description: The cloud dragon's body becomes vaporous and misty. They gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]{Gaseous Form}, except their fly Speed remains unchanged. The cloud dragon can use this action again to return to physical form.
Cloud Form.name: Cloud Form

Cloud Walk.name: Cloud Walk
Cloud Walk.description: The cloud dragon can tread on clouds or fog as though on solid ground.

Divine Aura (Chaotic only).description:
Poteri divini proteggono i bersagli, fornendo a ciascuno di essi bonus di status +1 alla CA e ai tiri salvezza finché rimangono all'interno dell'area.

Scegli un allineamento che appartiene alla tua divinità (caotico, malvagio, buono o legale). Non puoi lanciare questo incantesimo se non hai una divinità o se la tua divinità è neutrale pura. Questo incantesimo ottiene il tratto dell'allineamento scelto. I bonus forniti dall'incantesimo aumentano a +2 contro gli attacchi e gli effetti provenienti da creature con un allineamento opposto all'incantesimo (legale se hai scelto caotico, malvagio se hai scelto buono). Questi bonus aumentano fino a +4 contro gli effetti creati da tali creature che tentano di imporre la condizione @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controllato} su un bersaglio della tua aura divina, e contro gli attacchi perpetrati da creature evocate da qualsiasi cosa sia dell'allineamento opposto alla tua aura divina.

Quando una creatura dell'allineamento opposto colpisce un bersaglio con un attacco in mischia, deve superare un tiro salvezza su Volontà o è @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Accecata} per un round. Dopodiché è temporaneamente immune per 1 minuto.

La prima volta che Mantieni l'Incantesimo ad ogni round, il raggio di aura divina aumenta di 3 metri.
Divine Aura (Chaotic only).name: Divine Aura (Chaotic only)

Divine Decree (Chaotic only).description:
Pronunci una potente litania dalla tua fede, un'imposizione che nuoce a coloro che si oppongono ai tuoi ideali. Scegli un allineamento che appartiene alla tua Divinità (caotico, malvagio, buono o legale). Non puoi lanciare questo incantesimo se non hai una Divinità o se la tua Divinità è neutrale pura. Questo incantesimo ottiene il tratto dell'allineamento scelto. Infliggi 7d10 danni alle creature all'interno dell'area; ciascuna creatura deve effettuare un Tiro Salvezza su Tempra. Le creature che hanno un allineamento corrispondente a quello che hai scelto non sono colpite dall'incantesimo. Quelle che non hanno un allineamento corrispondente né opposto trattano il loro risultato come aumentato di un grado e non subiscono altri effetti oltre al danno.

Successo Critico La creatura non è influenzata.

Successo La creatura subisce metà dei danni.

Fallimento La creatura subisce danni per intero ed è @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Indebolita 2} per 1 minuto.

Fallimento Critico La creatura subisce doppi danni ed è @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Indebolita 2} for 1 minute. per 1 minuto. Se ti trovi sul tuo piano natio, una creatura che ha ottenuto un fallimento critico viene esiliata con l'effetto di un Tiro Salvezza fallito su @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.bay4AfSu2iIozNNW]{esilio} Una creatura di 10° livello o inferiore deve effettuare un Tiro Salvezza su Volontà. Con un fallimento, è @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralizzata} per 1 minuto; con un fallimento critico, la creatura muore.

Intensificato (+1) Il danno aumenta di 1d10 e il livello delle creature che devono effettuare un secondo Tiro Salvezza con un fallimento critico aumenta di 2.
Divine Decree (Chaotic only).name: Divine Decree (Chaotic only)

Freedom of Movement (Constant).name: Libertà di Movimento (Costante)
Freedom of Movement (Constant).description: Respingi gli effetti che ostacolerebbero una creatura o ne rallenterebbero i movimenti. Il bersaglio, mentre è sotto l'effetto di questo incantesimo, ignora tutti gli effetti che potrebbero fornire penalità di circostanza alla Velocità. Quando il bersaglio tenta di @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Sfuggire} da un effetto che lo ha @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Afferrato} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Trattenuto}, il tentativo ha successo automaticamente, a meno che l'effetto sia un effetto magico e di un livello superiore a quello dell'incantesimo libertà di movimento.

True Seeing (Constant).name: Visione del Vero (Costante)
True Seeing (Constant).description: Puoi vedere le cose entro 18 metri per quello che sono veramente. Il GM tira in segreto una prova di contrasto contro tutte le illusioni o trasmutazioni all'interno dell'area, ma soltanto allo scopo di determinare se vedi attraverso di esse (per esempio, se la prova ha successo contro un incantesimo metamorfosi, puoi vedere la vera forma della creatura, ma non poni fine all'incantesimo metamorfosi).

Demon Hunter.name: Demon Hunter
Demon Hunter.description: The thulgant causes a demon within 30 feet to suffer the effect of its sinful vulnerability.

Mind-Rending Sting.name: Mind-Rending Sting
Mind-Rending Sting.description:
Requirements The thulgant hits the same enemy with two consecutive sting Strikes in the same round

Effect The thulgant deals [[/r (3d12+17)[mental]]] damage to the enemy. If the enemy is affected by thulgant venom, that poison gains the virulent trait.

Stunning Display.name: Stunning Display
Stunning Display.description:
The thulgant rises up on its twitching limbs and presents its numerous tentacles and stingers in a horrifying display of awfulness. Creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:40] save, after which they are temporarily immune to further Stunning Displays for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 4}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 8}.

Thulgant Venom.name: Thulgant Venom
Thulgant Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:40]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 3d6[poison]]] damage and the victim gains one of the following at random: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 6d6[poison]]] damage and the victim gains two of the following at random: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 9d6[poison]]] damage and the victim gains all three of the following: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 3}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3} (1 round)

Thulgant.name: Thulgant
Thulgant.description: Although they spend most of their time hunting and battling demons for control of the Abyss, thulgants amuse themselves with a variety of diversions, such as maintaining galleries of petrified mortals or building massive, hive-like lairs filled with enslaved minions. Each of these qlippoth is a horrific tangle of limbs, with spiderlike legs, writhing tentacles emerging from the top of its head, and three scorpion-like stingers.

Hidden Movement.name: Movimento Nascosto
Hidden Movement.description: If the choker starts its turn @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} by a creature, that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the choker's attacks until the end of the turn.

Yank.name: Yank
Yank.description:
Trigger An enemy targets the choker with an attack

Effect The choker tries to pull a creature it has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} into the path of the attack. The choker attempts an Athletics check, including its bonus to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}. If it succeeds against the grabbed or restrained creature's Fortitude DC, the choker redirects the attack to that creature, and the attacker compares its attack roll result against the new target's AC. The choker must move the creature into a space adjacent to itself. The creature must also be moved within the attacker's reach against a melee attack or into a space between itself and the attacker against a ranged attack. The choker can't use this ability to make the attacker target itself, even if it's grabbing or restraining the attacker.

Strangling Fingers.name: Strangling Fingers
Strangling Fingers.description: Any creature hit by a choker's arm Strike is automatically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, and the choker begins to strangle the target. The creature is suffocating and can't speak as long as it's strangled. This prevents it from casting spells with a verbal component or activating items with a command component.

Black Scorpion Venom.name: Black Scorpion Venom
Black Scorpion Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:36]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 2d12[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 3d12[poison]]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 4d12[poison]]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 4}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} (1 round)

Rapid Stinging.name: Rapid Stinging
Rapid Stinging.description: The black scorpion makes three stinger Strikes, each against a different target. Its multiple attack penalty applies to each attack, but the penalty increases only after all the attacks have been made.

Pull Filament.name: Pull Filament
Pull Filament.description: The cave fisher pulls a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by its filament toward itself, even suspending the target vertically if necessary. The cave fisher attempts an Athletics check against the creature's Fortitude DC. On a success, the cave fisher pulls the creature 15 feet closer to it (30 feet closer on a critical success).

Sticky Filament.description: Any creature hit by the cave fisher's sticky filament is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}. The cave fisher can move while it has a creature grabbed with its filament, but it automatically releases the creature if the cave fisher moves beyond the filament's 60-foot length. The cave fisher can use only one filament at a time, and it can sever the filament and release any creature grabbed by it as a free action. The filament can be severed by a Strike that deals at least [[/r 10 #slashing]]{10 slashing damage} to it. This doesn't deal any damage to the cave fisher itself. The filament has AC 17, and its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} DC is 19.

Invisibility (At Will) (Self Only).name: Invisibilità (A Volontà) (Solo Se Stesso)
Invisibility (At Will) (Self Only).description:
Nascosto da un'illusione, il bersaglio diventa @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{invisibile}. Questo lo rende @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{non individuato} a tutte le creature, anche se queste possono tentare di trovare il bersaglio, rendendolo invece @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{nascosto} da esse. Se il bersaglio usa un'azione ostile, l'incantesimo termina dopo che quell'azione ostile viene completata.

Intensificato (4°) L'incantesimo dura 1 minuto, ma non termina se il bersaglio usa un'azione ostile.

Paranoia (At Will).description:
Induci il bersaglio a vedere tutte le creature come una preoccupante minaccia. Il bersaglio è in preda ad un'intensa paranoia nei confronti di tutte le creature che lo circondano e deve effettuare un Tiro Salvezza su Volontà.

Successo Critico Il bersaglio non è influenzato.

Successo Il bersaglio è convinto che chiunque veda costituisca una minaccia. Diventa @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.I1ffBVISxLr2gC4u]{Maldisposto} nei confronti di tutte quelle creature verso le quali non era ancora ostile, anche quelle che prima erano alleati. Non tratta nessuno come alleato. L'incantesimo termina dopo 1 round.

Fallimento Come per successo, ma l'effetto dura 1 minuto.

Fallimento Critico Come per fallimento, ma il bersaglio è convinto che chiunque veda sia un nemico mortale. Usa le sue reazioni e azioni gratuite contro questi nemici anche se prima erano suoi alleati, come determinato dal GM. Altrimenti agisce razionalmente come di norma e preferirà attaccare le creature che lo stanno attaccando od ostacolando attivamente piuttosto che quelle che lo lasciano in pace.

Intensificato (6°) Puoi prendere come bersaglio fino a 5 creature.
Paranoia (At Will).name: Paranoia (At Will)

Exit Body.name: Exit Body
Exit Body.description:
Requirements The intellect devourer is controlling a body with Body Thief

Effect The intellect devourer leaves its host body, which dies instantly and is no longer a suitable host for any Body Thief ability. The intellect devourer appears at full size in an adjacent space.

Stolen Identity.description: While an intellect devourer uses Body Thief, it gains the ability to understand and speak all languages known by the host, as well as knowledge of the host body's abilities, identity, role in society, and personality. However, it does not gain the specific memories or knowledge of the host body.

Intellect Devourer.name: Intellect Devourer
Intellect Devourer.description: Intellect devourers serve as advance scouts and infiltrators for the powerful force of alien beings called the Dominion of the Black. These monsters roam the Darklands, from which they mount secret invasions of the world above. When an intellect devourer infiltrates a society, its first priority is to acquire a body. It might first seek out a graveyard for a fresh corpse, as this is easier than fighting and killing someone. When the aberration compresses itself into the host's brain cavity, its real body goes dull to sensation as it connects to the nervous system of its host. If found out, an intellect devourer might quickly inhabit a new body to make its escape, preferably something inconspicuous such as a domestic animal.

Death Flood.name: Death Flood
Death Flood.description: When a grodair dies, its body explodes in a blast of pressurized water that deals [[/r 4d6[bludgeoning]]] damage to creatures within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true] save). A creature that fails its save is pushed 5 feet (or 10 feet on a critical failure).

Muddy Field.name: Muddy Field
Muddy Field.description: The grodair transforms all soil, sand, or similar sediment in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] into mud for 1 round. This mud is difficult terrain for creatures other than grodairs.

Organ of Endless Water.name: Organ of Endless Water
Organ of Endless Water.description: The grodair causes water to pour from a magical sac on its spine, either a stream of water at a rate of 1 gallon per round, or a fountain in a 5-foot-long stream at a rate of 5 gallons per round. It can stop the flow of water as a single action.

Augury (At will).description:
Hai la possibilita di dare una rapida occhiata al futuro. Durante il lancio di questo incantesimo, chiedi di sapere i risultati di una particolare linea di azione. L'incantesimo può predire risultati fino a 30 minuti nell'immediato futuro, e rivela le migliori risposte del GM tra i seguenti esiti:

  • Prosperità i risultati saranno favorevoli.
  • Sventura i risultati saranno sfavorevoli.
  • Prosperità e Sventura i risultati saranno sia favorevoli che sfavorevoli.
  • Niente i risultati non saranno particolarmente favorevoli né sfavorevoli.

Il GM tira in segreto una prova semplice con CD 6. Con un fallimento, il risultato è sempre "niente". Per questo e impossibile stabilire se un risultato "niente" e esatto. Se qualcun altro pone una domanda sullo stesso argomento del primo lancio di presagio durante un lancio aggiuntivo, il GM usa il risultato del tiro segreto del primo lancio. Se le circostanze cambiano, tuttavia, è possibile ottenere un risultato diverso.
Augury (At will).name: Augury (At will)

Envisioning.name: Envisioning
Envisioning.description: When a theletos conveys information, it does so wordlessly through psychic projections. This acts as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.kdhbPaBMK1d1fpbA]{Telepathy} with a range of 100 feet but is understandable to all creatures regardless of whether they have a language. The meaning to non-aeons can be vague and is often mysterious. A theletos can use this ability to communicate flawlessly with any other aeon on the same plane.

Fate Drain.description:
A creature damaged by the theletos's tentacle must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:22] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1}.

As long as the creature is stupefied, it can no longer benefit from fortune effects. If the target fails additional saves against this ability, the condition value increases by 1 (to a maximum of stupefied 4). This condition value decreases by 1 every 24 hours.
Fate Drain.name: Fate Drain

Wrath of Fate.name: Wrath of Fate
Wrath of Fate.description:
The theletos releases a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] of energy from its center. Creatures in the cone become overwhelmed with the knowledge of various fates that destiny has in store for them and lack of clear pathways to these potential futures. They must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:26] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} indefinitely.

An affected creature can choose to roll twice when it attempts an attack, saving throw, or skill check and take the lower result. Regardless of the outcome, that creature is no longer slowed after that roll.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.QSy3KaLI1AYTR7rP]{Effect: Wrath of Fate}

The theletos can't use Wrath of Fate again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Mohrg Spawn.name: Mohrg Spawn
Mohrg Spawn.description: A living creature slain by a mohrg that had a lower level than the mohrg rises as a mohrg spawn after [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}, on its turn. This mohrg spawn is under the command of the mohrg that created it. If the creator of the mohrg spawn is destroyed, the mohrg spawn is destroyed as well, immediately collapsing into a pile of decayed flesh and bones.

Paralysis.name: Paralysis
Paralysis.description: A living creature hit by a mohrg's tongue Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}. The creature can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each attempt.

Painsight.name: Painsight
Painsight.description: A velstrac automatically knows whether a creature it sees has any of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} conditions, as well as the value of those conditions

Unnerving Gaze.name: Unnerving Gaze
Unnerving Gaze.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it sees the face of a departed loved one in place of the evangelist's face. The creature must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:21] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3} on a critical failure).

Animate Chains.name: Animate Chains
Animate Chains.description: Chains in the evangelist's vicinity sprout barbs and writhe menacingly. The evangelist can make chain Strikes against any creature that is adjacent to an unattended chain within 20 feet, in addition to those within the reach of the evangelist's chain Strike.

Impaling Chain.description: When the evangelist critically hits with a chain Strike, the target is impaled and anchored in place, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the chain. The creature is unable to recover from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} damage until it gets free (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} DC 25).
Impaling Chain.name: Impaling Chain

Focus Gaze.name: Focus Gaze
Focus Gaze.description:
The evangelist stares at a creature they can see within 30 feet. The target must immediately attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:21] save against Unnerving gaze. In addition, if the creature was already @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, on a failed save, the evangelist is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from the creature for as long as the creature remains frightened.

After attempting this save, the creature is then temporarily immune until the start of the evangelist's next turn.

Hunting Spider Venom.name: Veleno di Ragno Cacciatore
Hunting Spider Venom.description:
This venom erodes its target's defenses, aiding the spider in securing prey.

Activate D Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw DC 21 Fortitude

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 1d10[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 1d12[poison]]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, and flat-footed (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 2d6[poison]]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}, and flat-footed (1 round)

Sneak Attack.name: Attacco Furtivo
Sneak Attack.description:
The Coil spy's Strikes deal an extra 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Mirror Image (At will).description:
Tre immagini illusorie volteggiano attorno al tuo spazio, e coloro che ti accano potrebbero potenzialmente colpire una delle immagini al posto tuo. Qualsiasi attacco che ti colpirebbe ha una possibilità a caso di colpire invece una delle immagini. Se hai a disposizione tutte e tre le immagini, c'è 1 possibilità su 4 che tu sia colpito (1 su 1d4). Se hai a disposizioni 2 immagini, c'è 1 possibilità su 3 che tu sia colpito (1-2 su 1d6). Con una sola immagine le possibilità sono 1 su 2 (1-3 su 1d6).

Quando un'immagine viene colpita, questa viene distrutta. Se un tiro per colpire è un fallimento contro la tua CA ma non un fallimento critico, distrugge un'immagine, ma non ha effetti aggiuntivi (anche se l'attacco avrebbe normalmente un effetto con un fallimento). Se il tiro per colpire è un successo critico e avrebbe colpito una delle immagini, una delle immagini viene comunque distrutta e il tiro per colpire diventa un successo contro di te. Dopo che tutte le immagini sono state distrutte, l'incantesimo termina.
Mirror Image (At will).name: Mirror Image (At will)

Ventriloquism (At will).description:
Ogni volta che parli o emetti vocalmente un qualsiasi altro suono, puoi far sembrare che la tua voce provenga da qualcun altro entro 18 metri, e puoi cambiare liberamente quella locazione apparentemente usi la voce. Qualsiasi creatura che ne ode il suono può tentare di dubitare della tua illusione.

Intensificato (2°) La durata dell'incantesimo aumenta fino a 1 ora, e puoi cambiare anche tonalità, qualità ed altri aspetti della tua voce. Prima di poter dubitare della tua illusione, una creatura deve superare attivamente una prova di Percezione, oppure usare azioni per interagire con quel suono.
Ventriloquism (At will).name: Ventriloquism (At will)

Maintain Disguise.description: A Coil spy can maintain an ongoing illusory disguise as long as they are conscious without having to re-cast the spell; they need only Cast the Spell again to reassume their illusory disguise if they wish to change their appearance or if the active spell is dispelled. Coil spies typically seek privacy when they need to sleep, as an ongoing illusory disguise ends an hour after they fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}.

Serpentfolk Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 1d4[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 2d4[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 round)
Serpentfolk Venom.name: Serpentfolk Venom

Coil Spy.name: Coil Spy
Coil Spy.description: Some serpentfolk undergo intense ritual training and practice to improve their innate ability to disguise themselves. These serpentfolk often identify as members of a sinister society known as the Coils of Ydersius, and the most devoted of their number seek out methods of reincarnating into new forms to even more efficiently infiltrate enemy societies. But before such agents take this extreme step, they must prove themselves as Coil spies. These serpentfolk train in methods of infiltrating other societies to such an extent that they might be capable of infiltrating a mammalian civilization for years. Though they're expected to work entirely toward the eventual triumph of their people, most Coil spies also find personal pursuits to keep them occupied in the shorter term. When Coil spies get caught, it's rarely due to a lack of pure skill, but rather to their arrogance or recklessness as they pursue their hedonistic desires.

Breath Weapon.name: Soffio
Breath Weapon.description:
The dragon breathes a spray of acidic salt water that deals [[/r 13d6[acid]]] damage in a @Template[type:line|distance:100] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:32|basic:true] save).

They can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Brine Spit.name: Brine Spit
Brine Spit.description:
Trigger A creature the brine dragon observes within 30 feet uses a concentrate action

Effect The dragon spits a glob of caustic salt water at the creature. The creature takes [[/r 5d6[acid]]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true] save). On a failure, the concentrate action is disrupted.

Smoke Slash.description:
Requirements The belker is partially inhaled by a creature

Effect The belker automatically deals its claw damage to the inhaling creature by forming a claw to slash and scrape the creature from within.
Smoke Slash.name: Smoke Slash

Noxious Fumes.description:
Requirements The belker occupies the same space as a Medium or smaller creature

Effect The belker attempts to flow into the creature's lungs; the creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23] save. On a failure, the creature partially inhales the belker and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} by the pain of the smoke rasping in its throat and lungs. The creature can attempt to exhale the belker by spending an action coughing and succeeding at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23] save. Most of the belker remains outside the creature, so the belker can still act normally. If the belker moves out of the creature's space or uses Noxious Fumes again, the creature automatically exhales it.

Detect Alignment (At will) (Lawful only).description:
I tuoi occhi risplendono nel percepire aure allineate. Scegli tra caotico, malvagio, buono o legale. Individui le aure di quell'allineamento. Non ricevi altre informazioni oltre alla presenza o all'assenza. Puoi scegliere di non individuare creature o effetti dei quali sei consapevole che abbiano quell'allineamento.

Soltanto gli incantatori di 6° livello o superiore, eccetto gli incantatori divini, i non morti e gli esseri della Sfera Esterna, hanno un'aura di allineamento.

Intensificato (2°) Individui anche la locazione e la forza di ciascuna aura.
Detect Alignment (At will) (Lawful only).name: Detect Alignment (At will) (Lawful only)

Sickening Display.description:
The cythnigot presents its awful appearance fully, and creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:17] save. Once a creature attempts this save, it's temporarily immune to further Sickening Displays for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until its next turn.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}, and is flat-footed for as long as it's sickened.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} and is flat-footed for as long as it's sickened.

Invisibility (Self only).description:
Nascosto da un'illusione, il bersaglio diventa @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{invisibile}. Questo lo rende @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{non individuato} a tutte le creature, anche se queste possono tentare di trovare il bersaglio, rendendolo invece @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{nascosto} da esse. Se il bersaglio usa un'azione ostile, l'incantesimo termina dopo che quell'azione ostile viene completata.

Intensificato (4°) L'incantesimo dura 1 minuto, ma non termina se il bersaglio usa un'azione ostile.
Invisibility (Self only).name: Invisibility (Self only)

Create Object.name: Create Object
Create Object.description:
Frequency three times per day

Effect The leprechaun produces an item out of their hat, from behind their jacket, from within a hole in a tree stump, or from any other unexpected location. This conjured item must be no more than 1 Bulk and must be made of relatively commonplace material (such as cloth, wood, stone, or even low-value metal like iron or lead). It can't rely on intricate artistry or complex moving parts, never fulfills a Cost or the like, and can't be made of precious materials or materials with a rarity of uncommon or higher.

The created object is temporary and lasts for 1 hour or until the leprechaun creates a new item, whichever comes first.

Leprechaun Magic.name: Leprechaun Magic
Leprechaun Magic.description: When a leprechaun uses their innate spells to deceive, trick, or humiliate a creature, the spell DC increases to 20 and the attack modifier to +11.

Change Shape.name: Cambiare Forma
Change Shape.description:
The water yai takes on the appearance of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.B0QyZEjAXUG5TsJU]{Storm Giant}. This doesn't change their Speed or Strike attack and damage. The yai can also turn into a puddle of water, with the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]{Gaseous Form} except they retain their land Speed, double their swim Speed, and can't fly.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Water Walk (Constant).description:
Il bersaglio può camminare sulla superficie dell'acqua e di altri liquidi senza cadervi dentro. Può andare sott'acqua se lo desidera, ma in questo caso deve Nuotare normalmente. Questo incantesimo non fornisce la capacità di respirare sott'acqua.

Intensificato (4°) Il raggio d'azione dell'incantesimo aumenta fino a 9 metri, la durata aumenta fino a 1 ora e puoi prendere come bersaglio fino a 10 creature.
Water Walk (Constant).name: Water Walk (Constant)

Invisibility (At will) (Self only).description:
Nascosto da un'illusione, il bersaglio diventa @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{invisibile}. Questo lo rende @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{non individuato} a tutte le creature, anche se queste possono tentare di trovare il bersaglio, rendendolo invece @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{nascosto} da esse. Se il bersaglio usa un'azione ostile, l'incantesimo termina dopo che quell'azione ostile viene completata.

Intensificato (4°) L'incantesimo dura 1 minuto, ma non termina se il bersaglio usa un'azione ostile.
Invisibility (At will) (Self only).name: Invisibility (At will) (Self only)

+2 Greater Striking Longspear.description: Questa lancia molto lunga, talvolta chiamata picca, è concepita per gli affondi anziché per essere scagliata. Usata da molti soldati e guardie cittadine per il controllo della folla e come difesa contro le cariche nemiche, deve essere impugnata con due mani.
+2 Greater Striking Longspear.name: +2 Greater Striking Longspear

Shocking Douse.description:
Trigger A creature within 100 feet casts a fire spell

Effect The water yai flourishes their kimono and attempts a Performance check to counteract the spell before it comes into effect. If the yai counters the spell, the triggering creature takes [[/r 9d6[electricity]]] damage from electrified water that sprays from the kimono (@Check[type:reflex|dc:35|basic:true] save).
Shocking Douse.name: Shocking Douse

Enveloping Kimono.name: Enveloping Kimono
Enveloping Kimono.description:
Requirements The water yai's last action was a successful kimono Strike

Effect The water yai extends a portion of their kimono to attempt to envelop a creature within 15 feet. The water yai must attempt a Performance check against the creature's Reflex DC.

Critical Success The creature takes [[/r 20d6[electricity]]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} until the end of its next turn.

Success As critical success, but only [[/r 10d6[electricity]]] damage.

Failure The target takes [[/r 5d6[electricity]]] damage but is not grabbed.

Critical Failure The target is unaffected.

Otherworldly Vision.description: A froghemoth's alien eyes allow it to perceive creatures within 30 feet, even if they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} or ethereal. It can still be fooled by successful Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, but it has @Check[type:perception|dc:38|traits:action:seek] in such cases. It also sees through and is unaffected by illusions with the visual trait if they are within 30 feet.

Electric Torpor.name: Electric Torpor
Electric Torpor.description: Though a froghemoth is immune to electricity damage, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round whenever it would have otherwise taken electricity damage.

Flailing Tentacles.description: The froghemoth makes up to four tentacle Strikes, each against a different target. These count toward the froghemoth's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks.
Flailing Tentacles.name: Flailing Tentacles

Barbed Tongue.description:
A creature hit by the froghemoth's tongue becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the froghemoth. The creature isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, but it can't move beyond the reach of the froghemoth's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue with a successful Strike against AC 31 that deals at least 15 slashing damage.

This deals no damage to the froghemoth but prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes 1 minute.

Froghemoth.name: Froghemoth
Froghemoth.description: A terrifying abomination of teeth, tentacles, and unbridled rage, the froghemoth is thankfully rarely encountered even in the deepest swamplands or most remote Darklands caverns. Capable of devouring dinosaurs and even dragons, it is a frighteningly effective ambush hunter, immersing itself in the mire with only its eyestalk protruding and watching in every direction at once with uncanny precision.

Aquatic Ambush.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

An orca can travel no further than 5 feet onto land as part of an Aquatic Ambush. After it does so, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Tj055UcNm6UEgtCg]{Crawls} to return to the water.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AquaticAmbush]

Dimension Door (Self Only).description:
Aprendo una porta che oltrepassa lo spazio normale, ti teletrasporti istantaneamente insieme a qualsiasi oggetto che indossi e trasporti dalla tua posizione attuale in uno spazio vuoto che puoi vedere entro il raggio d'azione. Se con questo incantesimo porti con te un'altra creatura (anche se la stai trasportando in un contenitore extradimensionale), l'incantesimo è perduto.

Intensificato (5°) Il raggio d'azione aumenta fino a 1,8 km. Non è necessario che tu sia in grado di vedere la tua destinazione, a patto che tu sia già stato in quel luogo in passato e che tu ne conosca relativamente la locazione e la distanza dalla tua posizione. Sei temporaneamente immune per 1 ora.
Dimension Door (Self Only).name: Dimension Door (Self Only)

Deep Breath.name: Respiro Profondo
Deep Breath.description: A bog strider can hold their breath for 2 hours.

Water Stride.description: The bog strider can stand and move on the surface of water or other liquids without falling through. The bog strider can go underwater if they wish, but they must @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim} to do so.
Water Stride.name: Water Stride

Jellyfish Venom.name: Jellyfish Venom
Jellyfish Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 2d8[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 3d6[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 2d10[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} (1 round)

Giant Jellyfish.name: Giant Jellyfish
Giant Jellyfish.description: Unlike its smaller cousins, the giant jellyfish is an active predator that chases down its prey through reefs or open water. It can even squeeze its enormous bell-shaped body into the tight confines of shipwrecks to drape its mane of tentacles across the exposed flesh of its prey.

Find Target.description: When a soul eater is conjured to the Material Plane to find a specific creature, it gains the benefits of a 5th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.LQzlKbYjZSMFQawP]{Locate} spell that isn't blocked by lead or running water. The conjurer must have seen the target and must speak the target's name while conjuring the soul eater in order to grant this ability.

Curse of the Weretiger.description:
This curse affects only humanoids

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18].

On each full moon, the cursed creature must succeed at another Fortitude save or turn into the same kind of werecreature until dawn. The creature is under the GM's control and goes on a rampage for half the night before falling unconscious until dawn.

Wall of Fire (At Will).name: Muro di Fuoco (A Volontà)
Wall of Fire (At Will).description:
Erigi un muro ardente che brucia le creature che vi passano attraverso. Crei un muro di fiamme spesso 1,5 metri, lungo 18 metri e alto 3 metri in una linea dritta, oppure un anello di fiamme spesso 1,5 metri, del raggio di 3 metri e della stessa altezza. Il muro è verticale in entrambe le forme; se lo desideri, il muro può essere di lunghezza o altezza inferiori. Qualsiasi cosa su entrambi i lati del muro è @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{occultata} alle creature sul lato opposto. Qualsiasi creatura che attraversa il muro o che occupa l'area del muro all'inizio del proprio turno subisce 4d6 danni da fuoco.

Intensificato (+1) Il danno da fuoco aumenta di 1d6.

Burning Hands (At Will).description:
Fiamme ardenti si sprigionano dalle tue mani. Infliggi 2d6 danni da fuoco alle creature all’interno dell’area.

Intensificato (+1) Il danno aumenta di 2d6.
Burning Hands (At Will).name: Burning Hands (At Will)

Fire Shield (Constant).description:
Ti avvolgi di fiamme, ottenendo resistenza al freddo 5. In aggiunta, le creature adiacenti che ti colpiscono con un attacco in mischia e le creature che ti toccano o ti colpiscono con un attacco senz'armi subiscono 2d6 danni da fuoco ogni volta che lo fanno.

Intensificato (+2) La resistenza al freddo aumenta di 5 e i danni da fuoco aumentano di 1d6.

Magma Tomb.description: Once per day, the dragon can spit a molten boulder at a target within 120 feet. This deals [[/r 12d6[fire]]] damage and [[/r 5d12[bludgeoning]]] damage, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:42|basic:true] save. If the creature fails its save, it's encased in magma that instantly cools and has Hardness 10, HP 40, and BT 20. The encased creature can't breathe and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} (Escape DC 42).

Fear (At will).description:
Infondi paura nel bersaglio; questi deve effettuare un tiro salvezza su Volontà.

Successo Critico Il bersaglio non è influenzato.

Successo Il bersaglio è @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 1.

Fallimento Il bersaglio è @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 2.

Fallimento Critico Il bersaglio è @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Spaventato} 3 e @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{In Fuga} per 1 round.
Fear (At will).name: Fear (At will)

Caustic Blood.name: Caustic Blood
Caustic Blood.description:
Trigger The nyogoth takes piercing or slashing damage

Effect The nyogoth sprays its acidic blood on adjacent creatures, dealing [[/r 6d6[acid]]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true] save).

Feeding Frenzy.name: Feeding Frenzy
Feeding Frenzy.description:
Requirements The nyogoth has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} a creature

Effect The nyogoth slavers and chews at the grabbed creature, dealing [[/r (2d6+7)[slashing]]] damage and [[/r 1d6[acid]]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:29|basic:true] save).

Nauseating Display.name: Nauseating Display
Nauseating Display.description:
The nyogoth untangles its tentacles and prolapses its many mouths, turning itself inside out in a truly nauseating display. Creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:29] save, after which they are temporarily immune to further Nauseating Displays for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 5} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

Twisting Tail.name: Coda Serpeggiante
Twisting Tail.description:
Trigger A creature within reach of the dragon's tail uses a move action or leaves a square during a move action it's using

Effect The dragon makes a tail Strike at the creature with a -2 penalty. If it hits, the dragon disrupts the creature's action.

Breath Weapon.name: Soffio
Breath Weapon.description:
The dragon breathes a flurry of piercing crystals that deal [[/r 12d6[piercing]]] damage in a @Template[type:cone|distance:40] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true] save).

They can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #Breath Weapon Recharge]]{1d4 rounds}.

Draconic Frenzy.name: Frenesia Draconica
Draconic Frenzy.description: Il drago effettua due Colpi con l'artiglio e un Colpo con la coda in qualsiasi ordine.

Draconic Momentum.name: Impeto Draconico
Draconic Momentum.description: The dragon recharges their Breath Weapon whenever they critically hit with a Strike.

See Invisibility (Constant).description:
Puoi vedere creature ed oggetti @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{invisibili}. Questi ti appaiono come forme traslucide e sono @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{occultati} a te.

Intensificato (5°) L'incantesimo ha una durata di 8 ore.

Dimension Door (At will).description:
Aprendo una porta che oltrepassa lo spazio normale, ti teletrasporti istantaneamente insieme a qualsiasi oggetto che indossi e trasporti dalla tua posizione attuale in uno spazio vuoto che puoi vedere entro il raggio d'azione. Se con questo incantesimo porti con te un'altra creatura (anche se la stai trasportando in un contenitore extradimensionale), l'incantesimo è perduto.

Intensificato (5°) Il raggio d'azione aumenta fino a 1,8 km. Non è necessario che tu sia in grado di vedere la tua destinazione, a patto che tu sia già stato in quel luogo in passato e che tu ne conosca relativamente la locazione e la distanza dalla tua posizione. Sei temporaneamente immune per 1 ora.

Mercy Vulnerability.description: Babaus revel in gore, and when wounds are healed, they recoil in pain. When a creature heals from damage that the babau dealt on their last turn with Grievous Strike, sneak attack, or a critical hit, the demon takes [[/r 4d6[mental]]] damage. The babau can take this mental damage only once per round.
Mercy Vulnerability.name: Mercy Vulnerability

Voice Imitation.description: An ahuizotl can mimic the sounds of a person in distress by attempting a Deception check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{Lie}. The ahuizotl has a +4 circumstance bonus to this check.

Tatzlwyrm.name: Tatzlwyrm
Tatzlwyrm.description:
Tatzlwyrms resemble human-sized snakes with two arms and a dragon's head. Distant relatives of true dragons, tatzlwyrms possess only a meager level of intelligence. They can speak Draconic (with a thick, hissing accent), but their ability to reason is limited and they can't use magic. They do possess a level of cunning, however, and some have been known to build rudimentary traps and even lairs. They are not treasure-hoarders, though, so don't expect to find a tatzlwyrm sitting atop a bed of coins.

Some tatzlwyrms have managed to forge working relationships with dragons, though it's a rare occurrence. From time to time, dragons have used them as messengers (because they can speak their language, however crudely), scouts (due to their smaller size), guides (when they're familiar with a particular mountain), and even muscle (harassing foes not worthy of a dragon's direct attention).

Tatzlwyrms don't work with kobolds, though-tatzlwyrms eat kobolds.

Tatzlwyrms hibernate in cold weather, and when they feel winter approaching they seek out underground lairs, mountain crevices, or even hay lofts. On one notable occasion, townsfolk reported being briefly overrun by tatzlwyrms after a conflict between spellcasters in the nearby hills caused a sudden blizzard. Local scholars still debate whether the cause of the influx was the sudden change in weather or if the creatures were drawn to one of the other magic users staying in town who were part of the same pilgrimage as those doing battle.

When confronted, tatzlwyrms are more likely to attack than retreat. Indeed, they sometimes lie in wait on purpose, taking advantage of their scales' natural camouflage and awaiting the chance to unleash their signature move: belching poisonous vapor into an opponent's face. Since this breath attack doesn't have much range, the wyrms usually need to grab their foes first and bring them close to their mouth.

Mauler.name: Laceratore
Mauler.description: The polar bear gains a +3 circumstance bonus to damage rolls against creatures it has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.

Polar Bear.description: Polar bears are known for their pale fur, with black eyes, lips, and toe pads. They are aggressively predatory creatures, stalking prey for miles on land or across the icy waters of frozen oceans. They are also amazing ambush predators, leaping from the water to ambush seals resting on ice floes. If they are desperate, polar bears hunt not only other animals but also humanoids.
Polar Bear.name: Polar Bear

Megalania Venom.name: Megalania Venom
Megalania Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 1d6[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 2d6[poison]]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 2d6[poison]]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 3}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} (1 round)

Megalania.description: Megalanias, like their smaller cousins the giant monitor lizards, strike fast and use their powerful bite to grip their prey. They prefer to swallow their prey whole rather than risk others getting a bite of a hard-won meal.

Motion Sense.name: Motion Sense
Motion Sense.description: A giant amoeba can sense nearby creatures through vibration and air or water movement.

Weak Acid.name: Weak Acid
Weak Acid.description: A giant amoeba's acid damages only organic material-not metal, stone, or other inorganic substances.

Envelop.description:
Requirements The giant amoeba begins its turn with a target its size or smaller @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}

Effect The giant amoeba maintains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{Grab} and extends pseudopods to surround the creature and pull it inside the amoeba's body. This thereafter has the same effect as if the amoeba had @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.zU3Ovaet4xQ5Gmvy]{Engulfed} the creature (DC 17, [[/r 1d6[acid]]] damage, Escape DC 17, Rupture 3).

Giant Amoeba.name: Giant Amoeba
Giant Amoeba.description: These blobs of nearly transparent protoplasm are identical in form and behavior to the microscopic creatures from which they have evolved, except their outlandish size makes them all the more dangerous. Unlike slimes, puddings, and other deadly oozes, giant amoebas have an outer membrane that contains their internal structures, making them more susceptible to slashing weapons than their amorphous kin. However, this membrane is also extremely flexible and permeable, allowing them to surround prey and absorb it, suffocating and slowly digesting it in the amoeba's acidic fluids.

True Seeing (Constant).name: Visione del Vero (Costante)
True Seeing (Constant).description: Puoi vedere le cose entro 18 metri per quello che sono veramente. Il GM tira in segreto una prova di contrasto contro tutte le illusioni o trasmutazioni all'interno dell'area, ma soltanto allo scopo di determinare se vedi attraverso di esse (per esempio, se la prova ha successo contro un incantesimo metamorfosi, puoi vedere la vera forma della creatura, ma non poni fine all'incantesimo metamorfosi).

Dimension Door (At will).description:
Aprendo una porta che oltrepassa lo spazio normale, ti teletrasporti istantaneamente insieme a qualsiasi oggetto che indossi e trasporti dalla tua posizione attuale in uno spazio vuoto che puoi vedere entro il raggio d'azione. Se con questo incantesimo porti con te un'altra creatura (anche se la stai trasportando in un contenitore extradimensionale), l'incantesimo è perduto.

Intensificato (5°) Il raggio d'azione aumenta fino a 1,8 km. Non è necessario che tu sia in grado di vedere la tua destinazione, a patto che tu sia già stato in quel luogo in passato e che tu ne conosca relativamente la locazione e la distanza dalla tua posizione. Sei temporaneamente immune per 1 ora.
Dimension Door (At will).name: Dimension Door (At will)

Vrolikai.description: Unlike other demons, the dread vrolikai doesn't form from a sinful soul-they instead manifest from a nabasu once the nabasu finally satisfies their hunger and returns to the Abyss, and as such vrolikais suffer from no vulnerability associated with a specific sin. A vrolikai who survives this process and the period of vulnerability that follows gains great power and in time can claim large regions of the Abyss as their own domain. Also known as death demons, these murderous monsters often serve demon lords as executioners or assassins.
Vrolikai.name: Vrolikai

Gust of Wind (At Will).name: Folata di Vento (A Volontà)
Gust of Wind (At Will).description:
Un vento violento si sprigiona dal palmo della tua mano, soffiando dal punto dove ti trovi al momento in cui lanci l'incantesimo fino alla fine della linea. Il vento spegne fuochi non magici piccoli, disperde nebbia e bruma, fa volteggiare oggetti di Volume leggero o inferiore e spinge oggetti più grandi. Le creature di taglia Grande o inferiore all'interno dell'area devono effettuare un tiro salvezza su Tempra. Le creature di taglia Grande o inferiore che entrano in seguito nella folata devono effettuare il tiro salvezza nel momento in cui entrano.

Successo Critico La creatura non è influenzata.

Successo La creatura non si può muovere contro vento.

Fallimento La creatura cade a terra @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prona}. Se stava volando, subisce invece gli effetti di fallimento critico.

Fallimento Critico La creatura viene spinta di 9 metri nella direzione del vento, cade a terra @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prona} e subisce 2d6 danni contundenti.

Breath Weapon.name: Soffio
Breath Weapon.description:
The dragon breathes a thundercloud that deals [[/r 11d6[electricity]]] damage in a @Template[type:cone|distance:40] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true] save).

They can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Soul Spells.description: A devourer casts occult innate spells, but to do so it must expend a number of soul charges equal to the spell's level (similar to casting a spell using charges from a staff). It can heighten any spell to a maximum of 6th level by expending more charges as it Casts the Spell. When encountered, a devourer typically has one trapped soul with 10 soul charges.

Air Walk (Constant).description: Il bersaglio può camminare nell'aria come se camminasse su terreno solido. Può salire e scendere in questo modo con un'angolazione massima di 45 gradi.
Air Walk (Constant).name: Air Walk (Constant)

Water Walk (Constant).description:
Il bersaglio può camminare sulla superficie dell'acqua e di altri liquidi senza cadervi dentro. Può andare sott'acqua se lo desidera, ma in questo caso deve Nuotare normalmente. Questo incantesimo non fornisce la capacità di respirare sott'acqua.

Intensificato (4°) Il raggio d'azione dell'incantesimo aumenta fino a 9 metri, la durata aumenta fino a 1 ora e puoi prendere come bersaglio fino a 10 creature.
Water Walk (Constant).name: Water Walk (Constant)

Flawless Hearing.name: Flawless Hearing
Flawless Hearing.description: An aolaz has an incredible sense of hearing. It can hear any sound made within 1,000 feet as though it were only 5 feet away from the source of the sound, and any sound within 1 mile as though it were only 30 feet away from the source of the sound. An aolaz's hearing is a precise sense.

Aolaz.name: Aolaz
Aolaz.description:
Aolazes are great beasts carved from stone and metal and magically imbued with the essence of life. The exact means of their creation is a long-lost secret, and they are so rare that scholars have little opportunity to study active specimens. The best-known aolazes are museum pieces or battlefield relics destroyed or deactivated centuries ago, though fragmented records suggest that many more were made and might remain, yet to be unearthed.

Most aolazes are built in the shape of great land-bound beasts, such as elephants, rhinoceroses, or dinosaurs. Regardless of the specific creature an aolaz has been constructed to resemble, it is not bound to walk the earth like its inspirations are-it's imbued with the magical ability to pursue across water and even through the air. Few can escape an aolaz's wrath once it is earned.

Hydraulic Push (At Will).description:
Invochi una potente esplosione di acqua pressurizzata che provoca danni contundenti al bersaglio e lo respinge. Effettua un tiro per colpire con incantesimo a distanza.

Successo Critico Il bersaglio subisce 6d6 danni contundenti e viene respinto di 3 metri.

Successo Il bersaglio subisce 3d6 danni contundenti e viene respinto di 1,5 metri.

Intensificato (+1) Il danno aumenta di 2d6.
Hydraulic Push (At Will).name: Hydraulic Push (At Will)

Obscuring Mist (At Will).name: Foschia Occultante (A Volontà)
Obscuring Mist (At Will).description: Evochi una nube di foschia. Tutte le creature all'interno della foschia sono @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{occultate}, e tutte le creature all'esterno della foschia diventano occultate alle creature all'interno di essa. Puoi Interrompere la nube.

Darkness (At Will).name: Oscurità (A Volontà)
Darkness (At Will).description:
Crei uno strato di oscurità che impedisce alla luce di penetrare o di emanare all'interno dell'area. La luce non entra nell'area e qualsiasi fonte di luce non magica, come una torcia o una lanterna, non emana luce mentre si trova all'interno dell'area, neppure se il raggio di luce emanato si estendesse al di fuori di oscurità. Questo incantesimo sopprime anche la luce magica dello stesso livello dell'incantesimo o inferiore della tua oscurità. La luce non può passare attraverso, perciò le creature all'interno dell'area non possono vedere al di fuori. Da fuori, appare come un globo di oscurità pura.

Intensificato (4°) Anche le creature con scurovisione (ma non scurovisione superiore) possono vedere a malapena attraverso l'oscurità. Esse trattano i bersagli che vedono nell'oscurità come @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{occultati}.

Create Undead (Shadows Only).description:
Trasformi il bersaglio in una creatura non morta fino al livello riportato nella Tabella 7-1. Ci sono molte versioni di questo rituale, ciascuna di esse appropriata per un tipo specifico di non morto (un rituale per tutti gli zombi, uno per gli scheletri, uno per i ghoul e così via) e i rituali che creano non morti rari sono a loro volta rari. Alcune forme di non morti, come i lich, si formano usando il loro metodo esclusivo e non possono essere creati con una versione di creare non morti.

Table 7-1: Rituali di Creazione Creature

Livello Creatura Livello Incantesimo RIchiesto Costo
-1 or 0 2 15 mo
1 2 60 mo
2 3 105 mo
3 3 180 mo
4 4 300 mo
5 4 480 mo
6 5 750 mo
7 5 1,080 mo
8 6 1,500 mo
9 6 2,100 mo
10 7 3,000 mo
11 7 4,200 mo
12 8 6,000 mo
13 8 9,000 mo
14 9 13,500 mo
15 9 19,500 mo
16 10 30,000 mo
17 10 45,000 mo

Successo Critic Il bersaglio diventa una creatura non morta del tipo appropriato. Se è almeno di 4 livelli inferiore a te, puoi farne un servitore. Questo gli fornisce il tratto servitore; ciò significa che può usare 2 azioni quando lo comandi, e comandarlo è un’azione singola con i tratti uditivo e concentrazione. Puoi avere un massimo di 4 servitori sotto il tuo controllo. Se è intelligente e non diventa un servitore, il non morto è collaborativo nei tuoi confronti per averlo risvegliato, nonostante rimanga una creatura orribile e malvagia. Se il bersaglio è intelligente e non diventa un servitore, puoi impartirgli un comando semplice. Persegue lo scopo con determinazione, ignorando qualsiasi tuo comando seguente.

Successo Come per successo critico, eccetto che un non morto intelligente che non diventa il tuo servitore è soltanto amichevole nei tuoi confronti, e un non morto intelligente che non diventa il tuo servitore si allontana da te a meno che tu non lo attacchi. Esso infesta l’area locale invece di seguire il tuo comando.

Fallimento Non crei il non morto.

Fallimento Critico Crei il non morto, ma la sua anima, torturata dalla tua folle necromanzia, è ricolma di odio nei tuoi confronti. Esso tenta di distruggerti.
Create Undead (Shadows Only).name: Create Undead (Shadows Only)

Freedom of Movement (Constant).name: Libertà di Movimento (Costante)
Freedom of Movement (Constant).description: Respingi gli effetti che ostacolerebbero una creatura o ne rallenterebbero i movimenti. Il bersaglio, mentre è sotto l'effetto di questo incantesimo, ignora tutti gli effetti che potrebbero fornire penalità di circostanza alla Velocità. Quando il bersaglio tenta di @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Sfuggire} da un effetto che lo ha @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Afferrato} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Trattenuto}, il tentativo ha successo automaticamente, a meno che l'effetto sia un effetto magico e di un livello superiore a quello dell'incantesimo libertà di movimento.

True Seeing (Constant).name: Visione del Vero (Costante)
True Seeing (Constant).description: Puoi vedere le cose entro 18 metri per quello che sono veramente. Il GM tira in segreto una prova di contrasto contro tutte le illusioni o trasmutazioni all'interno dell'area, ma soltanto allo scopo di determinare se vedi attraverso di esse (per esempio, se la prova ha successo contro un incantesimo metamorfosi, puoi vedere la vera forma della creatura, ma non poni fine all'incantesimo metamorfosi).

Curse of the Crooked Cane.name: Curse of the Crooked Cane
Curse of the Crooked Cane.description: When a creature slays a cairn linnorm, it must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:44] save or become permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}. In addition, the victim ages at an accelerated rate, aging 1 year every day, eventually causing it to die of old age if the curse is left untended.

Camouflage.name: Mimetismo
Camouflage.description: The blue-ringed octopus can change the color of its skin to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} even if it doesn't have cover.

Blue-Ringed Octopus Venom.name: Blue-Ringed Octopus Venom
Blue-Ringed Octopus Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 1d4[poison]]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 1d6[poison]]] damage (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 1d6[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} (1 round)

Blue-Ringed Octopus.description: While relatively small, the blue-ringed octopus is particularly venomous for its size.

Tongues (Constant).name: Linguaggi (Costante)
